definition: (of water) to dash against/to mix with water/to infuse/to rinse/to flush/to develop (a film)/to rise in the air/to clash/to collide with
"water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
variant of 衝擊|冲击[chong1 ji1]
to cleanse/to scrub/to scour/to wash down/to erode/to wash away
to stamp/to press (sheet metal)/Taiwan pr. [chong1 ya1]
to add water (or other liquid) to (another ingredient such as powdered milk or tea leaves)/to infuse (tea)
Tengchong county in Baoshan 保山[Bao3 shan1], Yunnan

sentences.english: Under the budget proposal, hedge-fund managers would be taxed at higher rates.
sentences.chinese: 根據預算方案，對沖基金經理將按更高的稅率繳稅。

sentences.english: If we minimize rise time we increase overshoot, and viceversa.
sentences.chinese: 如果我們減少上升時間，也就增加了過沖，反之亦然。

sentences.english: And that you have conflicting communities that your family and your country.
sentences.chinese: 而在你的家庭和國家間，有互相沖突的團體。

sentences.english: A graywater catchment system could collect reusable water for irrigation and toilet flushing.
sentences.chinese: 廢水回收系統可以用來灌溉，也可以用來沖廁所。

sentences.english: It isn't the first time that a hedge fund short-seller has publicly attacked Tesla recently.
sentences.chinese: 近來，已經有不只一位對沖基金經理公開看空特斯拉。

sentences.english: Any overshoot at turn on or turn off shall be less than 10% of rated output voltage.
sentences.chinese: 開機或關機時，電壓過沖不得超過標稱值的10%。

sentences.english: The bubble has now burst and hedge funds will be decimated.
sentences.chinese: 現在，泡沫已經破滅了，對沖基金將開始大量倒閉。

sentences.english: Some hedge funds remain dazzled by gold.
sentences.chinese: 些對沖基金仍然癡迷於黃金。

sentences.english: In the closing statement, the author re-state his opinions on hedge fund.
sentences.chinese: 在結語部分，筆者重申了對對沖基金看法。

sentences.english: Garlic is down, the water boiled, taste strong.
sentences.chinese: 蒜是新下來的，水一煮，味太沖。

sentences.english: Buyers of protection also have to find sellers—banks, say, or hedge funds.
sentences.chinese: 保險的購買者也必須找到賣家，例如銀行或對沖基金。

sentences.english: The hedge fund AQR has just issued a paper on the subject.
sentences.chinese: 對沖基金AQR剛剛發佈了一份該主題的文件。

sentences.english: Second, what is the optimal proportion of hedge funds in a portfolio ?
sentences.chinese: 其次，在一個投資組合中對沖基金的最適比例是多少？

sentences.english: Other methods such as jetting and electroosmosis are also available.
sentences.chinese: 使用噴沖和電滲也可以減小下沉阻力。

sentences.english: Experimental investigations on shock planarity were carried out.
sentences.chinese: 並對沖擊波的平面性進行了實驗研究。

sentences.english: The balance roller receives the impulses from the pallets via its impulse-pin.
sentences.chinese: 擺輪滾軸通過沖擊銷來接收擒縱叉的衝擊。

definition: thoroughfare/to go straight ahead/to rush/to clash
to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
to overdo it/to overstep the limit/excessively/above one's head/overhead
to throw oneself at/to pounce on/to devote one's energies/to flap/to flutter/to dab/to pat/to bend over
to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)
to overtake/to catch up with/to hurry/to rush/to try to catch (the bus etc)/to drive (cattle etc) forward/to drive (sb) away/to avail oneself of (an opportunity)/until
to fight over/to rush/to scramble/to grab/to rob/to snatch
see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
to scald/to burn (by scalding)/to blanch (cooking)/to heat (sth) up in hot water/to perm/to iron/scalding hot
